article: Mr. White was riding a horse in the rain all the afternoon. When he reached a restaurant, he was all  _  and cold. He saw a fire in  _  restaurant and many people sitting  _  it. He couldn't get a seat near the fire. He thought hard and soon he had an  _  . He called out to the waiter,"  _  some fish to my horse!"The waiter answered,"Horses don't eat fish."Mr White said,"  _  my horse eats fish."The waiter did as Mr White told him. The people in the restaurant  _  very strange and ran out after the waiter. When all the people went out, Mr White sat down at the table  near  the fire. When the waiter and the people  came back  , they said,"Your horse doesn't want eat the fish,"Mr White answered, "Put the fish on the table  _  my horse doesn't want it. I'll eat it as soon as I warm up and dry out."
